text: Zhenzhu jiang yao shuo:`Nimen tong jingling he renlei zhong yiqian shiqu de ge minzu yiqi jinru huo yu ba.'Mei dang yige minzu jin huo yu qu, zong yao zhouma ta de jiemei minzu, zhidao tamen tongtong dao qile. Tamen zhong houjin di lun ji xianjin de shuo:`Women de zhu a! Zhe deng ren ceng shi women mi wu, qiu ni shi tamen shou jiabei de huoxing.'Zhu shuo:`Mei geren dou shou jiabei de huoxing, dan nimen bu zhidao.'
